rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110321">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20110321</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110321</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Mar 21 16:46:00 PDT 2011:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Mar 21 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Barseghian, Crawl, Cornillon, Gallagher, Jones, Potter, Tao<br /> <p> <ul> <li> jing </li> <ul> <li> working on DT=&gt;metacat workflow </li> <ul> <li> fixed: wf wouldn't archive anything if no metadata change since last run </li> <li> added mechanism to compare metadata from sensor to see if it's changed since last run </li> <li> cleaned up workflow using composites </li> <li> added some top level parameters </li> <li> TODO test against real SPAN server </li> <li> TODO matt: is archiving easy enough for a new user? is it possible to easily select specific sensors for archiving? </li> </ul> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> nathan </li> <ul> <li> working on advanced search </li> <ul> <li> able to make queries and get results, found and discussed w/ ben metacat limitations </li> <ul> <li> temporal queries not supported by metacat. Matt: Ben has added support, but not yet in deployed metacats. </li> </ul> <li> current approach has some long term scalability issues </li> <li> now need to work on results browser, and integrate with kepler. dealing w/ some Swing issues. </li> <li> currently querying based on spatial and temporal resolution doesn't work -- info not in EML. James will help with this </li> <li> Matt: give us feedback on if you think the EML schema (spatialRaster) needs to be relaxed wrt resolution. For now can use additionalMetadata. It can point at individual entities. </li> </ul> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> peter </li> <ul> <li> jianwu sent new version of Front workflow last week, I'm going to test it locally, and then master-slave. </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> matt </li> <ul> <li> annual report, I'll be emailing asking for paragraphs and publications </li> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2011-03-21T23:46:00Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110321</wiki:history>  </item>  <item class="diff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> <tr><td class="diff">Line 4 was replaced by line 4</td></tr> <tr><td bgcolor="#FF9933" class="diffrem">- |Conference call| Mar 7, 2010 1:00 PT|</td></tr> <tr><td bgcolor="#99FF99" class="diffadd">+ |Conference call| Mar 28, 2010 1:00 PT|</td></tr> <tr><td class="diff">At line 6 added 1 line.</td></tr> <tr><td bgcolor="#99FF99" class="diffadd">+ |Conference call| |Mar 21, 2010|[Notes|ConferenceCallNotes2011-03-21]</td></tr> </table></description>   <wiki:version>149</wiki:version> <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=MeetingAgendasAndNotes</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110228">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20110228</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110228</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Feb 28 17:41:49 PST 2011:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Feb 28 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Barseghian, Crawl, Gallagher, Jones, Potter, Tao<br /> <p> <ul> <li> james </li> <ul> <li> java code almost ready for release </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> nathan </li> <ul> <li> getting back to writing ecogrid metacat queries </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> jing </li> <ul> <li> dataturbine to metacat workflow </li> <ul> <li> creates valid sensorML and can upload to MetaCat </li> <li> have changed to using HSQLD instead of MySQL </li> <li> fixed bug with duplicate data upload </li> <li> new bug: some data doesn't upload at all </li> </ul> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> derik </li> <ul> <li> testing SPAN / scripts / sensor-view, and filing bugs </li> <li> testing Kepler 2.2 RCs </li> <li> talked w/ Manish about Provenance Browser. file bug: allow WRM context menu to be extended, allow Provenance Browser to be invoked from a run </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> Provenance Browser discussion </li> <ul> <li> dan: plan to put trace files into provenance now. sean wrote a tool for creating comad trace from provenance DB data. </li> <li> derik file a bug to then include these traces in run-kars. </li> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2011-03-01T01:41:49Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110228</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110131">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20110131</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110131</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Jan 31 14:20:37 PST 2011:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Jan 31 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Barseghian, Cornillon, Gallagher, Jones, Potter, Riddle, Tao<br /> <p> <ul> <li> peter </li> <ul> <li> waiting to hear back from jianwu, jianwu has an intermittent problem on his side, this is hard to replicate. </li> <li> i will be a signficant user of this workflow when complete </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> sean </li> <ul> <li> budget issue, this may be my last call </li> <li> matt: I will email bertram </li> <li> two fixes that use overrides. discussion. </li> <li> TODO update bugs with current status </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> jing </li> <ul> <li> authentication search bug fixed. need to patch kepler library </li> <li> helped user setup workflow run engine, jianwu and i updated wiki doc </li> <li> some wf engine client code updates </li> <li> looking at sensorML. oxygen and xmlspy say the schema is valid, xerces 2.7 says it isn't. </li> <ul> <li> TODO try 2.11 xerces. possibly try saxon instead, ndp recommends saxon. </li> </ul> <li> wrt manish's DT=&gt;MetaCat workflow, todo: 1) schema issue 2) mysql issues - change to storing vals in plain text </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> nathan </li> <ul> <li> we need to query the opendap docs in metacat via ecogrid now. </li> <li> TODO talk w/ jing for examples of how to query, esp wrt using numerical constraints </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> derik </li> <ul> <li> change to kepler's components search to always use authenticated search </li> <li> some improvements wrt authentication exception handling and user error messages </li> <li> few wrm and reporting improvements </li> <li> going to ask feedback on WRM gui change </li> <li> TODO create reporting 2.2 target, add bugs, prep for release </li> <li> TODO talk w/ matt about SPAN work, create bugs </li> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2011-01-31T22:20:37Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20110131</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101220">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20101220</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101220</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Dec 20 16:45:09 PST 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Dec 20 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Anand, Barseghian, Gallagher, Tao<br /> <p> <ul> <li> derik & jing: </li> <ul> <li> derik - WRM discussion </li> <li> jing- problem determining director using entityId value. soln: also use derivedFrom </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> manish </li> <ul> <li> worked w/ Jing to create valid eml. Will join Jan3 call, and should complete work that week. </li> <li> tasks left: </li> <ul> <li> #5223 - should be quick, 30min job. </li> <li> fix #5218, currently problem generating valid sensorML </li> <li> #5216 and #5223 need to be changed from using MySQL to HSQLDB </li> <li> write documentation: prereqs for running the wf, component documentation, link to an example dataset generated using workflow </li> <li> workflow needs to be test run once complete, and datapackage viewed </li> <li> see if components should be added to actor library, documentation added to actors </li> </ul> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> james </li> <ul> <li> will discuss search UI w/ derik this week, ndp might start on this soon </li> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2010-12-21T00:45:09Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101220</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101122">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20101122</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101122</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Nov 22 17:15:50 PST 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Nov 22 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Altintas, Anand, Barseghian, Crawl, Cornillon, Jones, Riddle<br /> <p> <ul> <li> peter </li> <ul> <li> working w/ jianwu on parallelizing workflow using master-slave </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> sean </li> <ul> <li> hope to finish plotting work this week. Anything that plots 2 tuples of numerical data may be plotted now. </li> <li> will need a new task soon. </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> discussion of DataTurbine to Metacat work </li> <ul> <li> bertram: re: the email I sent (Transfer sensor data from DataTurbine DT to MetaCat MC), does the workflow determine and and only submit non-overlapping data? </li> <ul> <li> ilkay: we will check </li> <li> manish: it's true that trying to archive something already in MC won't go using the workflow </li> </ul> <li> ilkay: Manish's last day is Dec 8, planning to complete the DT=&gt;MC work by Dec 10. </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> manish </li> <ul> <li> should be able to complete by then. Will discuss w/ derik and dan re: <a class="external" href="https://kepler-project.org/developers/incubation/kepler-engineering-view-for-reap/transfer-sensor-data-from-dataturbine-to-metacat">DT=&gt;MC derik and dan bugs</a><img class="outlink" src="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/images/out.png" alt="" /> </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> jianwu </li> <ul> <li> working on peter's workflow in master-slave. Also working on a few bugs in master-slave </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> dan </li> <ul> <li> have been working on securing SPAN server - authenticating the connection and encryption using ssh. Almost done. </li> <li> plan to work on packaing components (e.g. as an rpm) that run on the SPAN server </li> <li> derik: is there a blocker for showing sensor actors in the tree? sean: I will update a bug explaining how to do this. dan: great, and then i will make the kars </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> derik </li> <ul> <li> working on getting WRM (and Reporting suite) to work with remote run-kar repositories. </li> <ul> <li> trying to use existing queryable infrastructure as much as possible now </li> <li> more efficient query that doesn't use karXml for building 'preview runs' now done. Downloading kars working. </li> <li> starting work on importing and properly synching, and gui changes wrt 'preview runs' vs imported husk runs </li> </ul> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2010-11-23T01:15:50Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101122</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101025">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20101025</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101025</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Oct 25 16:36:14 PDT 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Oct 18 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Altintas, Anand, Barseghian, Crawl, Cornillon, Gallagher, Jones, Riddle, Tao<br /> <p> <ul> <li> james </li> <ul> <li> presented info about crawling at Earth Science Data Systems Work Group meeting. </li> <li> Discussions there wrt iso 19105, SMAP, CF (Climate Forecast) metadata </li> <li> want to start crawling other servers to get a feel for sizes </li> <li> we should push forwards on discovery (e.g. within Kepler work) and do some server crawls (and any necessary related work) in the background </li> <ul> <li> need to start writing aggregations </li> </ul> <li> peter: can we integrate your discovery stuff w/ Fronts workflow? </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> dan </li> <ul> <li> need to finish a few more sensor site bugs </li> <li> then create screencast of how this works, then </li> <li> demo to seabloom </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> jing </li> <ul> <li> installed wf run engine and scheduler on KeplerDev server. derik tested, works. </li> <li> working on a multi-threading issue with the kepler gui </li> <li> security: we can disallow anon user scheduling, but we still have sandbox concerns to look into. </li> <li> derik: possible enhancement: option to filter out everything but unique workflows in left components area. </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> manish </li> <ul> <li> <a class="external" href="https://kepler-project.org/developers/incubation/kepler-engineering-view-for-reap/transfer-sensor-data-from-dataturbine-to-metacat">posted details of workflow for transferring data from DT to MetaCat</a><img class="outlink" src="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/images/out.png" alt="" /> </li> <li> set up meeting to discuss this in detail </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> derik </li> <ul> <li> no longer planning to add WRM to scheduler dialog, instead just add a dropdown menu for choosing repo above the existing WRM </li> <li> post mockup </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> sean </li> <ul> <li> working on tagging bugs </li> <li> need to go through plotting bugs </li> <li> talk with derik re: Reporting and Sensor View </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> ilkay </li> <ul> <li> had meeting with peter last week, discussed dist. computing techniques, master-slave maps well to his usecase </li> <li> matt: intersection of dist. computing techniques? optimally we want minimal configuration and workflow modification </li> <ul> <li> jianwu looking into parallel patterns in Kepler, this takes away background configuration. discuss further next time w/ jianwu </li> </ul> <li> matt: run master-slave past parviez and get his feedback on usability </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> derik </li> <ul> <li> are nightly builds all that's holding up move to 1.6? </li> <li> check with chad about changing builds.  </li> <li> find stats to estimate how many people may be in os X 10.5 on 32bit macs </li> <li> leadership team to discuss </li> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2010-10-25T23:36:14Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101025</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101018">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20101018</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101018</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Oct 18 17:40:23 PDT 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Oct 18 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Barseghian, Crawl, Gallagher, Ludaescher, Riddle, Tao<br /> <p> <ul> <li> plotting discussion </li> <ul> <li> dan's added a <a class="external" href="http://bugzilla.ecoinformatics.org/show_bug.cgi?id=4752">couple bugs to bug#4752</a><img class="outlink" src="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/images/out.png" alt="" /> that dan and derik ran into </li> <ul> <li> sean: i forgot to check in some classes, checking these in should fix many of these </li> </ul> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> derik - some sensor-view bugs </li> <ul> <li> sometimes many NPEs when plotting on my mac and java 1.5 </li> <li> importing a sensor site, or opening a saved sensor site (xml or kar) doesn't automatically switch your set of Views to sensor site and plotting </li> <li> sensor actors not in tree in sensor site view </li> <ul> <li> dan: the kars haven't been made yet </li> </ul> <li> when workflow not running, just going into a config dialog for a sensor actor, and hitting cancel, will change the sensor's color. </li> <li> focus is stolen from user when user is dragging an actor around but the sensor workflow is running (and updating actors progress displays (data point values)) </li> <li> can we remove Workflow Scheduler view now that it's in a Tools menu? yes. </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> james update </li> <ul> <li> 15 hours to crawl a site, 30mins to crawl it for URLs, 17min to group urls, 1m to generate EML. bottom line: use urls </li> <li> we should attempt the social solution of writing things that describe the aggregations and call people and ask them to put the xml on their servers. </li> <li> will be presenting at 9th\ufffd\ufffdEarth\ufffd\ufffdScience\ufffd\ufffdData\ufffd\ufffdSystems\ufffd\ufffdWork\ufffd\ufffdGroup, will email links to presentation and abstract. </li> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2010-10-19T00:40:23Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101018</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101010">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20101010</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101010</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS changed this page on Fri Oct 15 14:36:48 PDT 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><table class="diff" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> <tr><td class="diff">Line 29 was replaced by line 29</td></tr> <tr><td bgcolor="#FF9933" class="diffrem">- ** Need feedback on Sean's Plotting design as summarized in the screencast http://screencast.com/t/p0iloUOG</td></tr> <tr><td bgcolor="#99FF99" class="diffadd">+ ** Need feedback on Sean's Plotting design as summarized in the [screencast|http://screencast.com/t/p0iloUOG]</td></tr> </table></description>   <wiki:version>4</wiki:version>   <wiki:diff>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Diff.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101010&r1=-1</wiki:diff>   <dc:date>2010-10-15T21:36:48Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20101010</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100712">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20100712</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100712</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Jul 12 17:28:02 PDT 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Jul 12 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Altintas, Anand, Barseghian, Crawl, Jones, Leinfelder, Riddle, <br /> <p> <ul> <li> authentication discussion wrt sensor view </li> <ul> <li> leverage existing authentication manager </li> <li> TODO Ilkay wants to check w/ other projects re: DBs and authentication management </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> discussion re: formatting data from DataTurbine into EML and inserting into Metacat </li> <ul> <li> ben suggests running example reap DT data through the morpho wizard to annotate </li> <li> matt: if it seems EML doesn't provide what we want, possibly create and put sensorML into EML's additionalMetadata field </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> discussion of data search for archived sensor data </li> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2010-07-13T00:28:02Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100712</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100628">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20100628</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100628</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Jun 28 18:22:57 PDT 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Jun 28 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Barseghian, Crawl, Cornillon, Gallagher, Riddle, Wang <br /> <p> <ul> <li> james </li> <ul> <li> have XSLT producing valid EML, have done a crawl of grhsst and can produce EML from many of these. Have some EML questions though </li> <li> crawler is fairly robust now, can survive network crashes, going to run some big crawls this week </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> derik </li> <ul> <li> debi's leaving NCEAS, i'm working on remaining Reporting bugs </li> <li> TODO ask david if patching documentation is up to date </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> sean </li> <ul> <li> committed multi-tag search to WRM gui, committed a lot of code for engineering view model type this morning </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> dan </li> <ul> <li>fixed some bugs in sensor actor and simulator. Icon color now changes based on on and off, and showing timestamp and value from the last read. </li> <li> SPAN folks fixed bug, can now turn sensors on and off, and change sampling rate from Kepler </li> <li> also working on kepler-users question re: 64bit using different libraries for different platforms (64bit) </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> jianwu </li> <ul> <li> testing master-slave 2.0, will release after 2.0 </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> peter </li> <ul> <li> working w/ group about to (aug/sep) reprocess a large number of datasets to regenerate SSTs on a cluster. They're willing/interested to use Kepler to drive this processing, and I'd like to include the edge detection we've been working on as part of it in the post processing if possible. </li> <li> jianwu: send me program details </li> <li> will first work on refactoring fortran code, hope to get back to it in 2 weeks, busy w/ oil spill work </li> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2010-06-29T01:22:57Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100628</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100621">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20100621</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100621</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Jun 21 18:13:36 PDT 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Jun 21 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Barseghian, Crawl, Jones, Riddle, Staggs, Wang <br /> <p> <ul> <li> barseghian </li> <ul> <li> continuing work on multiple workflow run managers within one kepler instance, and making functions work when a WRM is connected to remote store.  </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> discussion of credentials: currently server side kepler uses a single user, we should fix this so individual users can schedule and server side will execute scheduled workflow as this user. Scheduler and server-side kepler should be able to use the same account creds. TODO: plan this out and file bugs </li> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> crawl  </li> <ul> <li> interfaces to query span host, get metadata, and create an eng view workflow. </li> <li> wrote simulator to simulate data coming from SPAN, uses random number generator currently. </li> <li> wrote program to take data from SPAN and put it into DataTurbine, and prog to mirror from cmd line </li> <li> TODO come up w/ timeframe projection w/ derik for how long things will take </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> </p><p> <ul> <li> jones: it would be good to put interface layers between Kepler and SPAN, for data and control - a new box in the GPP box that represents interface. </li> <ul> <li> dan can you make a list of methods Kepler will need for this interface? </li> <li>TODO turn on time estimates in bugzilla </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> riddle </li> <ul> <li> cont. work on component library gui customization; a sensor view model type. should be able to check in today or tommorow. </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> jianwu </li> <ul> <li> trying to release master-slave w/ 2.0. Some scripts need to be changed to account for having 2.0 in the module name </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> manish  </li> <ul> <li> cont work on data from DT =&gt; metacat. Need to figure out what metadata will have in or alongside DT with which to build EML that will be inserted into metacat. Will talk w/ Dan. </li> </ul> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> debi </li> <ul> <li> working on release and reporting 2.0 </li> </ul> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2010-06-22T01:13:36Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100621</wiki:history>  </item>  <item rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100614">   <title>ConferenceCallNotes20100614</title>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Wiki.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100614</link>   <description>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS created this page on Mon Jun 14 18:26:11 PDT 2010:<br /><hr /><br /><b>Jun 14 2010</b><br /> <b>Participants:</b> Barseghian, Riddle, Staggs <br /> <p> <ul> <li> derik - continued refactoring in wrm, reporting, and provenance to allow utilization of multiple different provenance stores at the same time. Have deletion of remote runs basically working, now working on being able to tag these runs, and view their reports. Delaying checking this into trunk so as to minimize trunk and 2.0 branch differences  to avoid confusion in case we need to do trunk vs 2.0 branch comparisons during release process. </li> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> sean - working on adding attributes to the actor tree actor shell objects so that they may be filtered, e.g. show only sensor-view set </li> </ul> </p><p> <ul> <li> debi - working on reporting 2.0 bugs, prompt to save KARfor a changed report </li> </ul> </p></description>   <wiki:version>1</wiki:version>   <dc:date>2010-06-15T01:26:11Z</dc:date>   <dc:contributor>    <rdf:Description>     <rdf:value>uid=barseghian,o=NCEAS</rdf:value>    </rdf:Description>   </dc:contributor>   <wiki:history>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/PageInfo.jsp?page=ConferenceCallNotes20100614</wiki:history>  </item>  <textinput rdf:about="http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Search.jsp">   <title>Search</title>   <description>Search this Wiki</description>   <name>query</name>   <link>http://reap.ecoinformatics.org/Search.jsp</link>  </textinput> </rdf:RDF>
